import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Container, Image, Col, Row, InputGroup, FormControl, Nav, Tab, Dropdown, DropdownButton } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../styles/UserProfile.css' class UserProfile extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { country: '' } } render() { return (
Login Information Address

First name Last name Username Email

this.setState({ country: 'Iraq' })}> Iraq this.setState({ country: 'USA' })}> USA this.setState({ country: 'Oman' })}> Oman City Post Code Street
); } } export default UserProfile;
